Model

Class BoardModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.BoardModel

  • public class BoardModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represends the Board of the game, and it will hold all the Units that are in the game until they die in which case the Player class takes hold of the defeated Units The Class is also responsible to populate the Board with the Units and also remove units.
    Author:
    Stavros Argyrou AM:2962

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardModel()
      The Constructor of the Board! It initializes with an empty 2 Dimensional array of type Unit that represents the game Board where the Units will be placed and the game will be played upon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillBoard(Unit[] player1Units, Unit[] player2Units)
      Puts the Units given by the players on the board before the game starts
      Unit[][] getBoardArea()
      Can access and return the whole game Board array that holds the Units
      void removeUnit(Unit defeated, Unit[] playerDefeatedUnits)
      Once a unit is defeated it is removed from the board and moved to the players defeated units
      void setBoardArea(Unit[][] boardArea)
      Sets the board array to be the same as the array given as a parameter

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardModel

        public BoardModel()
        The Constructor of the Board! It initializes with an empty 2 Dimensional array of type Unit that represents the game Board where the Units will be placed and the game will be played upon

    • Method Detail

      • fillBoard

        public void fillBoard(Unit[] player1Units,
                      Unit[] player2Units)
        Puts the Units given by the players on the board before the game starts
        Parameters:
        player1Units - the Units of the first Player - Array
        player2Units - the Units of the Second Player - Array

      • removeUnit

        public void removeUnit(Unit defeated,
                       Unit[] playerDefeatedUnits)
        Once a unit is defeated it is removed from the board and moved to the players defeated units
        Parameters:
        defeated - the Unit that is defeated
        playerDefeatedUnits - the Units array of the Player that lost the unit

      • getBoardArea

        public Unit[][] getBoardArea()
        Can access and return the whole game Board array that holds the Units
        Returns:
        the Game Board array

      • setBoardArea

        public void setBoardArea(Unit[][] boardArea)
        Sets the board array to be the same as the array given as a parameter
        Parameters:
        boardArea - game Board array to replace the current game board
